item.title: Kaspersky defends force-replacing its security software without users’ explicit consent

item.title: The WordPress vs WP Engine drama, explained
item.description:
The world of WordPress, one of the most popular technologies for creating and hosting websites, is going through a very heated controversy. The core issue is the fight between WordPress founder and Automattic CEO Matt Mullenweg and WP Engine, which hosts web sites built on WordPress. WordPress technology is open-source and free, and it powers […]
